verses.roman:
tṛtīya-puruṣa viṣṇu--'guṇa-avatāra'
dui avatāra-bhitara gaṇanā tāṅhāra

synonyms: tṛtīya-puruṣa—the third Personality; viṣṇu—Lord Viṣṇu; guṇa-avatāra—the incarnation of the material quality of goodness; dui avatāra-bhitara—within the two incarnations; gaṇanā-tāṅhāra—He is designated.
translation: "The third expansion of Viṣṇu is the Kṣīrodakaśāyī Viṣṇu, who is the incarnation of the quality of goodness. He is to be counted within the two types of incarnations [puruṣa-avatāras and guṇa-avatāras].
